meta.DESCRIPTION: Chat from your desktop with Threema Web and have full access to all chats, contacts and media files.

welcome.DESKTOP_BETA_HINT: Use the new desktop app now
welcome.DESKTOP_BETA_HINT_INTRO_TEXT1: Do you already use the new Threema desktop app?
welcome.PLEASE_SCAN: Scan this QR code with your Threema app
welcome.PLEASE_RELOAD: Please reload the page to try again.
welcome.CHOOSE_PASSWORD:
If you want to stay logged in, please enter
a session password before scanning.
welcome.CHOOSE_PASSWORD_AUTOPW:
If you want to avoid this QR-scan after restarting
Threema, please enter a password before scanning.
welcome.UNLOCK_FAILED_TEXT: You entered the wrong password, the session cannot be restored.
welcome.ENTER_PASSWORD:
To reconnect to your previous session,
please enter the password:
welcome.CONNECTION_INTERRUPTED: The connection to your phone was interrupted or closed.
welcome.UNLOCK_FAILED_FORGOTTEN: If you can't remember your password, simply choose “forget this session”, and set a new password.
welcome.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_ANDROID: This browser is not supported on Android
welcome.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_DETAILS: Please use the latest version of {firefoxLink}, {chromeLink}, {operaLink}, {edgeLink} or {safariLink} (iOS only), otherwise Threema Web might not work properly.
welcome.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_ANDROID_DETAILS: Please use the latest version of {firefoxLink}, {chromeLink}, {operaLink} or {edgeLink}, otherwise Threema Web might not work properly.
welcome.SAFARI:
Safari is only compatible with Threema Web for iOS.
If you are using Android, please use another browser.
welcome.WAITING_FOR_APP:
Waiting for Threema
to be started on your phone …
welcome.MANUAL_START_TEXT2: You can use Threema Desktop/Web without push service, but you need to start the session manually:
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP1: Open the Threema app, tap on the menu button in the top right and choose “Desktop/Web”
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP2: Tap on the session related to this browser
welcome.MANUAL_START_STEP3: Select “Start session” to start the session
welcome.LOCAL_STORAGE_MISSING_DETAILS: Access to LocalStorage not possible. This can occur if your browser is configured to reject cookies, or if you installed a browser add-on that blocks access to LocalStorage. Please allow local storage in your browser settings or disable any add-ons you might have installed.
welcome.LOCAL_STORAGE_EXCEPTION_DETAILS:
Critical error when accessing LocalStorage: {errorMsg}.
Try restarting your browser.
welcome.ALREADY_CONNECTED_DETAILS: You are already connected to Threema Web in another tab or window!

connecting.WAITING_FOR_APP_MANUAL: Push service not available. Please start the session manually.
connecting.CONNECTING_TO_APP: Connection to app is being established…
connecting.CONNECTION_CLOSED: Connection to server has been closed.

troubleshooting.SLOW_CONNECT: Connecting seems to take longer than usual …
troubleshooting.APP_STARTED_AND_VISIBLE: Is the Threema app running in the foreground?
troubleshooting.SESSION_DELETED: Did you delete this session on your mobile device?
troubleshooting.PHONE_ONLINE: Is your mobile device connected to the internet?
troubleshooting.UNLOCK_OR_CHARGE: It may help to unlock your device or connect it to a charger.
troubleshooting.PUSH_FAQ: Your device may be affected by Push Notification issues. See the FAQ articles for Android and iOS for troubleshooting.
troubleshooting.PUSH_FAQ_IOS_FOREGROUND: For more information about using Desktop/Web with iOS, see this FAQ article.
troubleshooting.WEBCLIENT_ENABLED: Is Desktop/Web enabled in the Threema app?
troubleshooting.PLUGIN: Is a privacy plugin installed in your browser which blocks WebRTC communication?
troubleshooting.ADBLOCKER: Do you use an ad blocker which also blocks WebRTC communication?
troubleshooting.IOS_48: Is Threema version 4.8 or higher installed on your mobile device? Then please click “Forget Session” and initiate a new session.
troubleshooting.PLEASE_UPDATE_APP: Please make sure that you're using the latest version of the Threema app!
troubleshooting.USE_ARCHIVE_VERSION: Alternatively you can switch back to the previous version of Threema Web.
troubleshooting.REPORT_FAQ: Please check out our FAQs first for general questions and to resolve common problems.
troubleshooting.REPORT_LOG: If you can't find an answer to your question or the problem persists, you can send a log report to the Threema support team.
troubleshooting.REPORT_VIA_THREEMA_UNAVAILABLE: Reporting the log via Threema is currently unavailable since there is no connection to your mobile device. Connect to your mobile device first.
troubleshooting.REPORT_VIA_CLIPBOARD: Alternatively, you may copy the log into the clipboard and report it to the Threema support team via the web form.
troubleshooting.REMOVE_SENSITIVE_DATA: Remove sensitive data (contacts, message contents, etc.)
troubleshooting.REPORT_VIA_THREEMA_FAILED: Sending log report to support failed.
troubleshooting.REPORT_VIA_THREEMA_SUCCESS: A log report has been sent to support.
troubleshooting.PLEASE_OPEN_AND_UNLOCK: Please unlock your iOS device, and open the Threema app to stay connected to the desktop app / the web client. Learn more…

common.CONFIRM_CLOSE_BODY: Do you really want to close this session?
common.CONFIRM_DELETE_BODY: Do you really want to delete this saved session?
common.CONFIRM_DELETE_CLOSE_BODY: Do you really want to close and delete this saved session?

messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL2_EXPLAIN: The identity of this person has been verified using e-mail or SMS.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL3_EXPLAIN: You have verified the identity of this person by scanning their code.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL1_EXPLAIN: There is no guarantee that this person is who they claim they are.
messenger.VERIFICATION_LEVEL2_WORK_EXPLAIN: The identity of this person has been verified by your Threema Work administrator
messenger.COMPOSE_MESSAGE: Type a message or drop a file
messenger.MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT: {messageCount, plural, one {Threema message from} other {{messageCount} Threema messages from}}
messenger.COPY_ERROR: Error: Could not copy text to clipboard
messenger.NAME: Name
messenger.GROUP_DELETE_REALLY: Do you really want to delete this group completely? All members will be removed.
messenger.GROUP_REALLY_LEAVE_ADMIN: You are the administrator of this group. If you leave it now, it will become orphaned. The other members will still be able to chat but changes will no longer be possible.
messenger.GROUP_REALLY_LEAVE: Do you really want to leave this group?
messenger.DISTRIBUTION_LIST_DELETE_REALLY: Do you really want to remove this distribution list?
messenger.PRIVATE_CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Private chats are not supported in Threema Desktop/Web.
messenger.MESSAGE_TOO_LONG_SPLIT_BODY: No more than {max} characters can be sent per message, do you want to split it into {count} separate messages?
messenger.BALLOT_MESSAGES_NOT_SUPPORTED: Polls are not yet supported in Threema Desktop/Web.
messenger.DELETE_THREAD_MESSAGE: {count, plural, one {Do you really want to delete this chat? You will not be able to recover the messages.} other {Do you really want to delete {count} chat(s)? You will not be able to recover the messages.}}
messenger.PINNED_CONVERSATION: Conversation is pinned. Click to unpin.
messenger.UNPINNED_CONVERSATION: Conversation is not pinned. Click to pin.

messageStates.PENDING: The message is being transferred to your device
messageStates.SENDING: The message is being transferred to the Threema server
messageStates.SENT: The message was delivered to the Threema server
messageStates.DELIVERED: The message was delivered to the recipient's device
messageStates.READ: The message was read by the recipient
messageStates.FAILED: The message could not be sent

modifyReceiver.notAllowedLinked: Contact cannot be changed: It's linked to a system contact
modifyReceiver.notAllowedBusiness: Avatar cannot be changed: It's a Threema Gateway contact
modifyReceiver.alreadyLeft: You have already left this group
modifyReceiver.valueTooLong: A value you entered is too long

error.NO_CONNECTION: Connection error, please try again later.
error.CONTACT_BLOCKED: You cannot send messages to a blocked contact.
error.CONTACT_INVALID: You cannot send messages to an invalid contact.
error.FILE_TOO_LARGE: Files larger than {maxmb} MiB cannot be sent
error.FILE_TOO_LARGE_WEB: Currently files larger than 15 MiB cannot be sent through Threema Desktop/Web
error.FILE_TOO_LARGE_GENERIC: File is too large to be sent
error.NOTIFICATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: You have to grant the notification permission for Threema Web manually in order to receive desktop notifications.
error.NOTIFICATION_API_NOT_AVAILABLE: Your browser does not support desktop notifications.

about.OPEN_SOURCE: Threema Web is fully open source.
about.SOURCE_CODE: The source code and the licensing terms can be found on GitHub:
about.NOTIFICATION_SOUNDS: Sound files © 2012 soundsnap.com - Licensed under the Soundsnap License
about.LICENSE_TEXT: Licenses of used open source components can be found in the source code.
about.CHANGELOG_TEXT: The Threema Web changelog can be found on GitHub.

composearea.SUBMIT_KEY_ENTER: 'Enter' to send a message. 'Shift+Enter' to add a new line.
composearea.SUBMIT_KEY_CTRL_ENTER: 'Ctrl+Enter' to send a message. 'Enter' to add a new line.

deviceUnreachable.UNABLE_TO_CONNECT: Unable to reconnect to your device …

version.NEW_VERSION_BODY: A new version of Threema Web ({version}) is available. Check out the {changelog} for more information. Click “OK” to activate the update.

battery.LEVEL_LOW: Your device battery level is low ({percent}%).
battery.LEVEL_CRITICAL: Your device battery level is critical ({percent}%)!

connection.SESSION_STOPPED: The session was stopped on your device.
connection.SESSION_DELETED: The session was deleted on your device.
connection.WEBCLIENT_DISABLED: Threema Desktop/Web was disabled on your device.
connection.SESSION_REPLACED: This session was stopped because you started a Threema Web session in another browser window.
connection.OUT_OF_MEMORY: The session had to be stopped because your device ran out of memory.
connection.SESSION_ERROR: The session was stopped due to a protocol error.
connection.PUSH_ERROR_INFO: Attempts to wake up your device using push notifications have failed. This can happen, for example, if you have switched to a new mobile device recently.
connection.PUSH_ERROR_ACTION: Should this error persist, please click “Forget Session” and initiate a new session.
